title: Mission Problem (?)
body: Hey! I was playing these new missions and got to the point where i must get 5 kills to move on.. I completed it and now i dont have any missions in mission panel. Actually I have one - to complete 7 missions... Can somebody help me with this?

replies.body: Hail PoroKnight!  New missions are aimed to refresh around 11:00am PDT as Project Canshi mentioned.  Hang tight!

there will be daily missions every day refreshing at 11 am i think dun know when its gonna be today doe 
hope i could help
